title: Add Telemetry Data Point
objective: Learn how to modify an Electronic Data Sheet telemetry message payload definition and telemeter the value.

exercise.instructions:
Locate the 'DataTypeSet: Telemetry Payloads' comment block. Add the following entry to HkTlm_Payload's <EntryList>:
  Entry name='SetParamCmdVal'
  type='BASE_TYPES/uint16'

Locate the @TEMPLATE@_Class_t definition. In the '@TEMPLATE@ State & Contained Objects' section add:
  'uint16  SetParamCmdVal;'

Locate the @TEMPLATE@_SetParamCmd() function added in lesson 1. Before the return line add:
  '@Template@.SetParamCmdVal = CmdPayload->Param;'

Locate the SendHousekeepingTlm() function. After the command counter lines add:
  'Payload->SetParamCmdVal = @Template@.SetParamCmdVal;'
